publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2872 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro â€”That the Parliament welcomes the visit by Natasa Micic, President of the National Assembly of the Republic of Serbia, Gordana Comic, Vice-President of the National Assembly of the Republic of Serbia and Vesna Perovic, President of the National Assembly of the Republic of Montenegro; notes the potential for future partnership between the peoples and legislatures of Serbia, Montenegro and Scotland, and urges the Scottish Executive and all members of the Parliament to embrace our international responsibility to foster democracy and co-operation.
S1M-2872 Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro (lodged on 8 March 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2872 Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro (lodged on 8 March 2002) Michael Matheson*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2872 Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro (lodged on 8 March 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2872 Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro (lodged on 8 March 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-2872 Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro (lodged on 8 March 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2872 Official Visitors from the National Assemblies of Serbia and Montenegro (lodged on 8 March 2002) Ms Sandra White*
